topicTitle: Suggestion!! pm if you got a suggestion.

posts.postText:
HELLO EVERYONE!    

 Maybe there should be a Suggestion thread for Perp?:) So I decided to make one. If you got a suggestion pls reply or Pm and I'll put it in this thread. And ofcourse give you credits! 

  Youtube tv's inside Izzies palace!  
I've noticed that there is some tv's inside Izzies palace, it could be awesome if you could go on youtube on those. That could be pretty awesome!
- Zontie
There's a suggestion subforum right above where it says "*Beta* Garry's Mod: PERP2"
